<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Repress memory sanitization, due to use-after-destroy by operator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// delete. Bug report 24578 identifies this issue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2c79436804022a1275836a6dd12946d1">LLVM&#95;NO&#95;SANITIZE&#95;MEMORY&#95;ATTRIBUTE</a> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> User::operator </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">delete</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Usr) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Hung off uses use a single Use&#42; before the User, while other subclasses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use a Use&#91;&#93; allocated prior to the user.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;Obj = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/user">User</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Usr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Obj-&gt;HasHungOffUses) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42;&#42;HungOffOperandList = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> &#42;&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(Usr) - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// drop the hung off uses.</span></CodeLine>
